name: Cheril the Goddess
description:
Cheril the Goddess is the third game in the Cheril series and by now the jungle girl has become a powerful warrior who knows how to fly and can launch energy balls solely through the power of will. However these skills require a lot of energy. While investigating in the slums of Little Olimpo (province of Badajoz) she intercepts a rumour that prince Chicken awaiting a special delivery of arogas in the Temple of the Big Cucumber. This substance would allow her to practice her skills without affecting her vitality, giving her a chance to final submit her nemesis Eleuterio, the Very Serious Monkey, to her will. To get to the arogas she needs to activate three Sila-Tsikl elemental tri-force shrines by breaking them with sacred talismans. This will give her access to the temple.

This 2D platform game consists of a single level composed of several single-screen rooms connected both horizontally and vertically offering an amount of freedom to explore. Cheril needs to complete platforming sections while avoiding enemies. She needs to locate the three talismans and bring them to the correct shrine to activate them. However, she can only carry one item at a time. She has no means to attack. Her new abilities allow her to fly and this avoid some tricky platform sections, but this drains her vitality meter. It can only be recharged every now and then when hearts are found. The game can be played in three difficulty levels.
